casebody.data:
IN RE J.F. 2018-0384 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 15, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Upon review, it appears that this cause involves termination of parental rights. Sua sponte, this cause shall proceed according to the Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of Ohio that pertain to cases involving termination of parental rights. Appellee's memorandum in response shall be filed no later than 20 days from this date.
